tag_list: remotestylist-com, decor, design, kelly-fallis, remote-stylist, interior, home
overview:
Entrepreneur, social media and web expert, avid traveller, fabulous connector, loves home decor and design. After a life in finance and a successful real estate staging career, nothing surprised Kelly…except why typing the words “gray paint” into Google had to be so complicated. Was getting 95,000 results a good use of anyone’s time?!

Combining her creativity and determination with her obsession for all things online, she resorted to her inner geek and created Remote Stylist - the global hub for home decor. No matter who you are or where you live, making decorating decisions just became affordable, fast and fun!

What keeps her going? Her ruthless compassion, curiousity, connections and, of course, her fabulous team!

external_links.title: In Town and Wondering What To Do
